General.Name: Shanghai Aladdin Biochemical Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Shanghai Aladdin Biochemical Technology Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of scientific research reagents in China. It offers reagent products, include chromatography consumables, cell factories, glassware, instrument tools, and other products, as well as protective clothing, masks, gloves, goggles, etc. under the Core Silicon Valley and Aladdin brands. The company's products are primarily used in the field of chemistry, life science, analytical chromatography, and material science. It sells its products through aladdin-e.com, an e-commerce platform. The company was founded in 2009 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
